document.full_text: france's ban on full face veils, a first in europe, went into force monday, exposing anyone who wears the muslim niqab or burqa in public to fines of 150 euros ($216).
document.title: french full veil ban goes into force
lines_and_colors: france's ban on full face veils, a first in europe, went into force monday, exposing anyone who wears the muslim niqab or burqa in public to fines of 150 euros ($216).
